headline: Liquid AI closes $250 million early-stage funding round led by AMD
summary: Generative artificial intelligence startup Liquid AI said on Friday that it had closed a $250 million early-stage funding round led by chipmaker Advanced Micro Devices, which is also its strategic partner. Consumer GenAI, which captured global attention in 2022 with the launch of OpenAI's ChatGPT, is at the center of the rapidly growing AI sector. This year also saw investors funnelling billions of dollars into GenAI startups.

headline: These sectors will outperform in 2025: Portfolio mgr.
summary: F/M Investments senior vice president and senior portfolio manager Francisco Bido offers a preview of the market landscape headed into 2025, highlighting key sectors and transformative trends on Wealth! Bido identifies information technology and retail as his top two sectors for the upcoming year. Within these sectors, he spotlights companies like AMD (AMD), First Solar (FSLR), Palantir (PLTR), and Burlington Coat Factory (BURL) as promising investment opportunities. Artificial intelligence emerges as a standout sector with significant growth potential, especially as data centers become increasingly prevalent. "This is just the beginning of a long-term ramp-up, so it's gonna carry into 2025, 2026, and God knows when," Bido explains, emphasizing the sustained momentum of AI innovation. Watch the video above to hear Bido's outlook on the consumer picture for the upcoming year. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here. This post was written by Angel Smith

headline: Why AMD Is a Much Stronger Investment than Intel (INTC)
summary: I used to be bullish on semiconductor designer and manufacturer Intel (INTC), but following the board’s decision to remove the CEO, I’m left uncertain about the company’s future. Instead, semiconductor designer AMD (AMD) is firing on all cylinders, with robust management and a fortified market position. As a result, I’m bullish on AMD and think it can generate a reliable 60% or more total price return in the next 24 months. Intel’s CEO Was Ousted, Leaving Uncertainty Pat Gelsinger, the CEO of In

headline: 1 Spectacular Artificial Intelligence (AI) ETF to Buy With $40 During the S&P 500 Bull Market
summary: The S&P 500 (SNPINDEX: ^GSPC) index has been on an absolute tear over the last couple of years.  Technology stocks are leading the index higher, but those in the artificial intelligence (AI) space have generated especially powerful gains.  Nvidia stock, for example, is up by a whopping 188% this year.
